mapper.insert: INSERT INTO canbo_b2b_processlog( data_source, interface_name, info_json, result_json, process_comment, process_flag, process_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, quarter ) VALUES ( #{dataSource}, #{interfaceName}, #{infoJson}, #{resultJson}, #{processComment}, #{processFlag}, #{processTime}, #{createById}, #{createDt}, #{updateById}, #{updateDt}, #{quarter} )
